text: mahinda prasad masimbaula pramukha tharuna kawin rasak bihiwenna patangaththa.
wasam thuna mema ruka(pahatha balanna), anekuth siyaluma wansha praweni ruk men jiwin athara sambandhathawayan sambandha upanyasayaki(upakalpithayaki).

dushanayata erehi kriyanwithaya sambandhayen eksath jathika pakshaya samaga thamange mona mathabheda thibunath, wenath wadagath katayuthu sambandhayen ema pakshaya mona tharam thamanwa nosalaka katayuthu kala wiya haki wethath, 2020 pebarawari masaya dakwa eksath jathika pakshaya samaga ekata yanawa misa wenath wikalpayak thamanta nathi bawa janadhipathiwaraya therum gatha yuthuwa thibuni.
palath palana mathiwarana poraya nila washayen arambaimata thawath aththe dina dekak pamani.
obe shailiyata aththatama mama kamathiyi ..
hari watina thorathuru tikak..
dan balanna deyak na wage.
bhayanakama wachanaya anthima..
ithin hamoma dana handuna ganima aththatama wadagath.sayibaraye yalukam koyi tharam sonduruda kiyala oba dannawane.

amathyawaraya me bawa prakasha kale eeye (25) rathmalana, dharmapalaramaye di shri lanka amarapura maha nikaye abhinawa uththarithara mahanayaka dhurayen pidum labu aggamaha panditha athipuchya kotugoda dhammawasa swaminwahanse baha daka unwahanse ge suwaduk balima pinisa giya awasthawedi ya.
owun kalu da sudu da miti da usa da ugath da nugath da lassana da awalassana da kri sthiyan da bauddha da muslim da yanna wadagath natha.
saman geta adiya thabaddi ee handa asena samange birinda dayani kothanaka sitiyada salayata paminima supurudu sirithaki.
idiriyedi pawathwimata niyamitha kumana ho mathiwaranayakadi eksath jathika pakshaya eksath jathika peramuna yatathe tharagawadimata thiranaya kara thibe.
methek ohu wenuwen gi gayuwe thalan mehemud ha mukeshya.
labana sathiya elambaini.
oyamaduwata hamuda aාyudha gabada sankirnayak ...!!!
sadayak nam eya sanwidhanaya karannek sitiya yuthu athara ohuta ho ayata ee sandaha wadagath hethuwak thibiya yuthuya.
kolambaa aparadha kottasaye niladharin mema malasirura goda gena aththe aluthin idikara thibu ema niwes aththiwarama yata wala dama thibiyadiya.
yam pudgalayeku pandarinma rahase methanata pamina me konkrit kotasa burul karana laddeda?
suba aluth awuruddak pawule samata !!!
pada - rathna shri wijesinha

me sangamaya kriyathmaka wanne mahajana saukhyaya wenuwen no wa anek oona ma wruththiya samithiyak kriyathmaka wana aakarayen ma thama wruththiya surakshithabhawaya pilibanda gatalu sandaha pamanak bawa wadi denakuta no watahe.
eya 2013 nowambar masa 09 dina wiwrutha we.
me nisa shasanaya surakshitha wiya.
eya akilata adala ya.
sinhala janayagen wenas wu manawa lakshana wadi janaya thulin pennum karanabawa gaweshanayan gen oppu wi atha.

ee hamoma ekka ekathuwela guwanwiduliya godananganna aditan karagena innawa” mehidi abhinawa sabhapathi jagath wikramasinha mahatha shri lanka guwanwiduli sansthawe adhyaksha jenaral lesa katayuthu karana chandrapala liyanage mahathage dakshathawa ha hakiyawa upayogi karaganimata labima pilibanda thama sathuta prakasha kaleya.

ginna niwa damuwada eya athiwimata hethuwa thawamath handunagena natha.
“kisima kenek inna thanin, helawenna wath epa!”

shri lankawe pradhanama mathsya ganumkaruwan wanne yuropaya bawa penwa dun amathyawaraya pawasanne mathsya thahanama iwath kirimata me masaye wisi eka weni dina thiranathmaka sakachchawak pawathwena athara itha ikmanin nawathath yuropayata mathsya nishpadana aanayanaya aarambha kirimatath kramanukulawa welandapola nawatha goda nagimatath balaporoththu wana bawayi.
paththare aran baluwath dakala athi mudal pennima yamkisi mudalakata karala denawa kiyala danwim.

gasa agana – ara randana malata mana – bohoma hina supipuna buth – sarana peleth dedunneth – kiya wenasath gasa wathusudu – wi pirisidu pohoya nathidu – silgath bandu buthsarana mal wiwidha warna mishrithaya.

madhyakalina awadhiyedi wasara gananawak thisse athiwu yuddha, sagatha ha wisheshayen wasangatha aadiya nisa lowata ahimi wu miliyana gananawaka jiwitha nisawen ekala sahithyayata ha kalawata meya wishala washayen balapana ladi.

yuddhaya awasan kota siyalu jathin ha deshapalana paksha ape janadhipathithuma ekathu kalak men loka prajathanthrawadi tharuna sammelanayata siyalu deshapalana paksha ekathuwela sahabhagiwima itha wadagath karunak yayi usas adhyapana amathi es. bi. disanayaka mahatha pawasiya.disanayaka mahatha ese pawasuwe kolambaa taj samudra hotalaye (17) pawathi loka prajathanthrawadi tharuna sammelanaya pilibanda madhya sakachchawakata sahabhagi wu awasthawediya.17 wani loka tharuna ha shishya ulela 2010 wasare desambar masa 13 wani dina sita 21 wani dina dakwa dakunu aprikawedi pawathwimata loka prajathanthrawadi tharuna sammelanaya thiranaya kota thibini.

pata pata malwata randilina hini wal...matha wada....hathihalana....naki bambaareki man....kata matha dodana....musikayeki man...wiyapath uyan pethaka...thanikada malin gahana...bambaarek asa nogatunu...nikalal kadupul soyana.....thaniwama handana...bilindeki man....nilwan dahane....sirakaruweki man...nirudaka katharak mada....eethanapath wadulaka..hiru muwangin sangawunu....piwithuru pini diya soyana...thaniwama handana....bilindeki man....kandulali sayure...selaruweki man.
